description:
The law firm of Grimes Teich Anderson has a law office in Spruce Pines, North Carolina, from which we represent the rights and entitlements of clients throughout Mitchell County and the surrounding areas who have legal needs involving any of the following:

• Serious personal injury and wrongful death claims resulting from car and truck accidents, defective products, drug and medical device injuries, premises liability claims, dog bites, nursing home abuse, and other preventable tragedies
• Workers' compensation
• Social Security Disability
• Veterans law
• Employment law

Over the more than 40 years we have been in practice, we have grown to become one of our region's most prominent personal injury and employment law firms with eight total offices located across North Carolina and South Carolina. During this time, we have handled thousands of cases, and we have recovered millions of dollars in settlements and verdicts for our plaintiff clients. This success has earned our membership in the Million Dollar Advocates Forum, and our attorneys have received national recognition for their outstanding professionalism and service.

Among our most notable accolades, our attorneys have received AV Preeminent peer-review ratings* through Martindale-Hubbell and consistent recognition from Best Lawyers along with Top 100 Trial Lawyer designations from the National Trial Lawyers. Honored by those we have served, we have also received Superb client ratings on Avvo as well as many testimonials and referrals from our satisfied clients.

To begin receiving the benefits of working directly with a local attorney who has extensive legal experience and will deliver highly personalized counsel and support to increase your chances of obtaining the justice you deserve, you can contact Grimes Teich Anderson to schedule a free initial consultation.
